displayName: Ensure 'clr strict security' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'
rationale: Enabling use of CLR assemblies widens the attack surface of SQL Server and puts it at risk from both inadvertent and malicious assemblies.
error_message: Server has 'clr strict security' set to '0'
ruleNames: Ensure 'clr strict security' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'
